title: Designed for the way
paragraphs: The QX Series represents Metro's most advanced desk system, combining Scandinavian design principles with German engineering precision. Each desk is crafted from sustainably sourced materials and built to exceed EN 527 office furniture standards.
Whether configuring a single workstation or an entire open-plan office, QX adapts seamlessly with its modular frame system, integrated cable management, and extensive range of accessories.
